Description: Postcard; printed; monochrome photograph showing the Jewish University on the Mount of Olives in Jerusalem with a figure in the foreground tending to the vegetation next to an electricity pole.
Producer name: Published by: The Oriental Commercial Bureau
Associated places: Topographic representation of: Mount of Olives
Acquisition name: Donated by: M C A Macdonald
Acquisition notes: Acquired by the donor in Jerusalem in 1967 from an Armenian-run shop next to the Jaffa Gate.
